Merge branch 'feature/retrofit' into develop
Reset version name, target new SDK (which required fiddling with DSLV's dependencies), heed some new lint warnings
Update 3rd party libraries and the open source attributions
Use an array to back the quick player selection list so the checkboxes will stay checked
Use a min height on dropdown items

LogPlayer changes:
Use a custom action bar, moving the add field button to the bottom of the screen
Refactor field hiding (mainly for performance)
Scroll to the newly added field
Change label of the number to text button
Back always means cancel
In log play, move the add field menu to a button
Move the 'add player' button out of the list
Add a round color swatch in the dropdown, list of game colors, and in the log player screen
Move the timer button from the action bar to the form
Move clear player button to form
Move the play sort button to the form (and other small fixes)

Move the game name to the form
A few alignment tweaks
Implement done/cancel custom action bar
Reformat display of player color; fix setting play date to today, add null check in equals
Fix failure in collection sync for games without a collection ID
Don't launch buddy activities and fragments by URIs
Add the ability to see players next to GeekBuddies
Change the log player screen to have the player name first (not user name); autocomplete now shows buddies and past players
Fix player sorting and storing collection thumbnail
Add an adapter for autocompleting user names

Collapse the drag handle to the color view
Sort players correctly when there are more than 10
Don't include updated, saved, or sync state when comparing plays

Don't launch the PlayActivity when creating a new play, but scroll to the play tab
Save start time on pause
Show the image as the background to the header while logging plays (when available)
Improve the data loading logic and experience of logging a play
Change provider operation that yields from first to last

Add release notes
Refactor date picker dialog
Show the correct year in of the collection item (not the game); fix bug in retrieving thumbnail URL of collection item

Move min SDK to 9 (as required by OkHttp)
Rework the forum thread layout to work in all layouts (hopefully) to get around reported crashes
Retrieve collection item by _id, not collection_id

Correctly parse collection ID and quantity
Correct saving multiple collection items for a single game
Improve insertion of reference records while saving a game
When applying a batch, never return null
Improve the sync logic and logging

Only store recent play history if the play is logged for today
Only show timer for today's play
Show sync timestamps in settings
Collapse private info into a single string
Add a player count column instead of querying the players table
Only show timer toggle for today's play OR if the timer is running
Capture the (sub)type of an item
Change expansion filtering to use the new subtype column
Allow saving of collection items that don't have a collection ID (just played or commented)

Change database to allow null collection IDs
Correctly persist a collection item without an ID
When syncing collection by status, don't include previous collection statuses.
Sync accessories
Update release notes
Remember if a game has custom sorted player order

Fix null exception when syncing the collection
Sync accessories when getting a game's collection
Apply batch in debug mode now returns an array similar to non-debug mode

Make 'up' from the game activity work again
When ending a play, don't show the play timer notification
Correct determine custom player sorting; don't crash when editing a player without a starting position
Correct play equality; correctly display a play as it is uploaded; fix problem with displaying play tab when it's already displayed
Retry getting the buddy collection
Correct collection provider, specifically for accessories
Populate SyncResults stats
Change the comment rating background to interpolate between integer colors; draw a border around it; prevent crash when switching comment sort order before it is loaded.
Move game links to the menu and update several of the URLs
Enable syncing of played games that aren't otherwise in the collection; correct bug in collection status filter; correct null pointer exception reported in Play Store.
Handle games that haven't been rated yet
Improve display of played non-collection games
Update release notes; update Picasso and Retrofit; update version code and name; fix parse error on forums with no threads
